title: Did Trump Allie Carl Baladino say that Michelle Obama should go live in a cave with a gorilla?
subtitle: The former co-chair of Donald Trump's New York presidential campaign also said he hoped that President Obama would die of cow disease.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The former official of the Trump Carl Baladino campaign said that he hoped that President Obama would die of crazy cow disease and Michelle Obama would go live in a cave in Africa with a gorilla.
